Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Singleton public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
A user service implementation, that checks whether a user is allowed in. Then given a number of parameters, either registers the user automatically, or denies access...
